alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 3:02PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Prowers and northeastern Baca Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 302 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Walsh, or 15 miles west of The Saunders Elevator, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walsh, Vilas and Stonington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
